description.value:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.MndcBMz6I7e6SRqx]{Weapon Improviser Dedication}

You quickly snatch up whateverâ€™s nearby and then attack with it as an improvised weapon.

You @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact} to pick up a nearby object you could use as an improvised weapon. It must be located at around your chest level, such as a mug on a table, rather than an object on the floor. You then either @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strike} or make an @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.FSxugo3zTgRhW7Og]{Improvised Pummel} with the improvised weapon.
